channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Jabber (XMPP) notifier and control Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Jabber (XMPP) notifier and control Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21634|2024-08-03T18:16:23.795Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jabber%20%28xmpp%29%20notifier%20and%20control%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Jabber (XMPP) notifier and control Plugin 1.41 and earlier stores passwords unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.
